name: Ascension (itch) (theinsomniacsld43)
description:
We recommend you use fullscreen for the best appearance!

In Ascension, you play as a demigod sent to the human realm to prove your worth to the gods.

In order to ascend and become a full god, you must complete the tasks the God’s have assigned you.

The only catch – it’s against the order of the gods for demigods to intervene directly in the human realm.

Use the recruited acolytes to accomplish your tasks.

Do you possess the resolve to complete the gods task and complete your ascension; even if that means sacrificing those around you?!
